knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# 1) Follow instructions in GitTutorial.html to

- Install git
- Make an account at Github
- put your Mt Gonga analysis script onto github. 
- Modify your analysis and commit and push the change.
- post a link to your repo in the zoom chat

# 2) Follow instruction in ForkTutorial.html (and BranchTutorial.html) to

- Fork & clone someone else's Mt Gonga repo
- Make a new branch in Rstudio
- comment/edit the code and commit your changes
- Push changes to github
- From github, open pull request to repo owner.

- Repo owner can accept or reject pull request.
